00040 #ifndef _CameraManager_cpp
00041 #define _CameraManager_cpp

00043 #include "cameramanager.h"

00047 #include <vector>

00050 namespace phys

00052     CameraManager::CameraManager (Ogre::SceneManager* SManager)
00053     {
00054         this->SceneManager = SManager;
00055         this->DefaultCamera = NULL;
00056         this->ONodes=0;
00057         this->SNodes=0;
00058     }
00059 
00060     CameraManager::~CameraManager ()
00061     {
00062         if(NULL!=DefaultCamera)
00063         {
00064             delete DefaultCamera;
00065         }
00066         while(!Cameras.empty())
00067         {
00068             Cameras.pop_back();
00069         }
00070         while(!Nodes.empty())
00071         {
00072             Nodes.pop_back();
00073         }
00074     }
00075 
00076     Ogre::Camera* CameraManager::FindCamera(String Name)
00077     {
00078         for( std::vector<Ogre::Camera*>::iterator c=Cameras.begin(); c!=Cameras.end(); c++ )
00079         {
00080             if ( Name == (*c)->getName() )
00081             {
00082                 return *c;
00083             }
00084         }
00085         return NULL;
00086     }
00087 
00088     Ogre::SceneNode* CameraManager::FindNode(String Name)
00089     {
00090         for( std::vector<Ogre::SceneNode*>::iterator c=Nodes.begin(); c!=Nodes.end(); c++ )
00091         {
00092             if ( Name == (*c)->getName() )
00093             {
00094                 return *c;
00095             }
00096         }
00097         return NULL;
00098     }
00099 
00100     String CameraManager::CreateCamera ()
00101     {
00102         if(NULL==DefaultCamera)
00103         {
00104             String Name="DefaultCamera";
00105             this->DefaultCamera = this->SceneManager->createCamera(Name);
00106             return Name;
00107         }
00108         std::stringstream namemaker;
00109         String Name="Camera";
00110         namemaker << Name << Cameras.size()+1;
00111         Ogre::Camera* tempcam = this->SceneManager->createCamera(namemaker.str());
00112         Cameras.push_back(tempcam);
00113         return namemaker.str();
00114     }
00115 
00116     String CameraManager::CreateOrbitingNode (Vector3 Target, Vector3 RelativeLoc)
00117     {
00118         std::stringstream namemaker1;
00119         String Name1="OrbitingNode";
00120         this->ONodes++;
00121         namemaker1 << Name1 << ONodes;
00122         Ogre::SceneNode* orbitingnode = this->SceneManager->createSceneNode(namemaker1.str());
00123         Nodes.push_back(orbitingnode);
00124         if(Vector3(0,0,0)==Target)
00125         {
00126             this->SceneManager->getRootSceneNode()->addChild(orbitingnode);
00127             orbitingnode->setPosition(RelativeLoc.GetOgreVector3());
00128             orbitingnode->setAutoTracking(true, this->SceneManager->getRootSceneNode());
00129         }
00130         else
00131         {
00132             //creation
00133             std::stringstream namemaker2;
00134             String Name2="CenterNode";
00135             namemaker2 << Name2 << ONodes;
00136             Ogre::SceneNode* centernode = this->SceneManager->createSceneNode(namemaker2.str());
00137             Nodes.push_back(centernode);
00138             //placement
00139             this->SceneManager->getRootSceneNode()->addChild(centernode);
00140             centernode->addChild(orbitingnode);
00141             centernode->setPosition(Target.GetOgreVector3());
00142             orbitingnode->setPosition(RelativeLoc.GetOgreVector3());
00143             orbitingnode->setAutoTracking(true, centernode);
00144         }
00145         return namemaker1.str();
00146     }
00147 
00148     String CameraManager::CreateStandNode (Vector3 LookAt, Vector3 Location)
00149     {
00150         std::stringstream namemaker;
00151         String Name="StandNode";
00152         this->SNodes++;
00153         namemaker << Name << SNodes;
00154         Ogre::SceneNode* tempnode = this->SceneManager->createSceneNode(namemaker.str());
00155         this->SceneManager->getRootSceneNode()->addChild(tempnode);
00156         tempnode->setPosition(Location.GetOgreVector3());
00157         tempnode->lookAt(LookAt.GetOgreVector3(), Ogre::Node::TS_WORLD);
00158         Nodes.push_back(tempnode);
00159         return namemaker.str();
00160     }
00161 
00162     void CameraManager::ClearNodes ()
00163     {
00164         this->Nodes.erase(Nodes.begin(), Nodes.end());
00165         return;
00166     }
00167 
00168     void CameraManager::ClearCameras ()
00169     {
00170         this->Cameras.erase(Cameras.begin(), Cameras.end());
00171         return;
00172     }

00174     void CameraManager::SetLocation (Vector3 Location, String Name)
00175     {
00176         if(Name=="DefaultCamera")
00177         {
00178             this->DefaultCamera->setPosition(Location.GetOgreVector3());
00179             return;
00180         }
00181         Ogre::Camera* tempptr = FindCamera(Name);
00182         tempptr->setPosition(Location.GetOgreVector3());
00183         return;
00184     }

00281 
00282     void CameraManager::SetAutoTracking (bool Enabled, String Target, Vector3 Offset, String Name)
00283     {
00284         if(Name=="DefaultCamera")
00285         {
00286             Ogre::SceneNode* Trgt = FindNode(Target);
00287             this->DefaultCamera->setAutoTracking(Enabled, Trgt, Offset.GetOgreVector3());
00288             return;
00289         }
00290         Ogre::SceneNode* Trgt = FindNode(Target);
00291         Ogre::Camera* tempptr = FindCamera(Name);
00292         tempptr->setAutoTracking(Enabled, Trgt, Offset.GetOgreVector3());
00293         return;
00294     }
00295 
00296     void CameraManager::SetAutoTracking (bool Enabled, String Target, String Name)
00297     {
00298         if(Name=="DefaultCamera")
00299         {
00300             Ogre::SceneNode* Trgt = FindNode(Target);
00301             this->DefaultCamera->setAutoTracking(Enabled, Trgt);
00302             return;
00303         }
00304         Ogre::SceneNode* Trgt = FindNode(Target);
00305         Ogre::Camera* tempptr = FindCamera(Name);
00306         tempptr->setAutoTracking(Enabled, Trgt);
00307         return;
00308     }
00309 
00310     String CameraManager::GetNodeAttachedToCamera (String Name)
00311     {
00312         if(Name=="DefaultCamera")
00313         {
00314             Ogre::SceneNode* tempnode = this->DefaultCamera->getParentSceneNode();
00315             return tempnode->getName();
00316         }
00317         else
00318         {
00319             Ogre::Camera* tempcam = FindCamera(Name);
00320             Ogre::SceneNode *tempnode = tempcam->getParentSceneNode();
00321             return tempnode->getName();
00322         }
00323     }
00324 
00325     void CameraManager::AttachCameraToNode (String NodeName, String CamName)
00326     {
00327         Ogre::SceneNode* tempnode = FindNode(NodeName);
00328         if(CamName=="DefaultCamera")
00329         {
00330             tempnode->attachObject(this->DefaultCamera);
00331         }else{
00332             Ogre::Camera* tempcam = FindCamera(CamName);
00333             tempnode->attachObject(tempcam);
00334         }
00335 
00336         return;
00337     }
00338 
00339     void CameraManager::DetachCameraFromNode (String NodeName, String CamName)
00340     {
00341         Ogre::SceneNode* tempnode = FindNode(NodeName);
00342         Ogre::Camera* tempcam = FindCamera(CamName);
00343         tempnode->detachObject(tempcam);
00344         return;
00345     }
00346 
00347     void CameraManager::IncrementYOrbit (Real Radian, String Name)
00348     {
00349         Ogre::Radian Rad(Radian);
00350         Ogre::SceneNode* tempptr = FindNode(Name);
00351         tempptr->yaw(Rad, Ogre::Node::TS_PARENT);
00352     }
